# <a name="change-the-look-of-your-outlook-mailbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="81faf-102">更改 Outlook 邮箱的外观</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="81faf-102">Change the look of your Outlook mailbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="81faf-103">您可以更改邮件列表和阅读窗格的外观，使其以所需方式显示和行为。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="81faf-103">You can change the appearance of the message list and reading pane so it looks and behaves the way you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="81faf-104">选择是单独显示邮件还是显示为对话，如果新邮件应显示在邮件列表的顶部或底部，等等。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="81faf-104">Choose whether your messages should be displayed individually or as conversations, if new messages should appear at the top or bottom of the message list, and more.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="81faf-105">选择齿轮图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="81faf-105">Select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="81faf-106">在页面顶部，打开 "设置" 窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="81faf-106">at the top of the page to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="81faf-107">选择重点收件箱、显示密度、对话视图和阅读窗格的设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="81faf-107">Choose your settings for Focused Inbox, display density, conversation view, and reading pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="81faf-108">在邮件列表的顶部，选择 "**筛选** > **排序依据**" 以选择要对电子邮件进行排序的方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="81faf-108">At the top of the message list, select **Filter** > **Sort by** to choose how you want to sort your email.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="81faf-109">若要了解详细信息，请参阅[更改邮箱的外观](https://support.office.com/article/b41c2ecb-f23c-42b3-b7f8-659646d5e58c)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="81faf-109">To learn more, see [Change the look of your mailbox](https://support.office.com/article/b41c2ecb-f23c-42b3-b7f8-659646d5e58c).</span></span>
